scripts.start: set NODE_ENV=production && node ./bin/www && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.devStart: set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon ./bin/www --ext js,json,ejs && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.debug: set NODE_ENV=development && nodemon --inspect ./bin/www && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.prodDebug: set NODE_ENV=development && node ./bin/www && npm run tailwind:css
scripts.tailwind:css: postcss public/stylesheets/tailwind.css -o public/stylesheets/style.css && npm run tailwind:css
